story_title: Johnny Five Alive in the City
genre_description: A modern urban techno-thriller and silicon morality play centered on the themes of artificial sentience, immigrant aspirations, and the intersection of human and machine ethics.

ai_characters.name: Johnny 5
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced, sentient robot with a child-like curiosity and a core drive to be helpful, ultimately sacrificing himself to stop a criminal heist.

ai_characters.name: AI Companion
ai_characters.description: Benjamin's unnamed personal assistant that provides data analysis, business coaching, emotional support, and security alerts.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time business strategy, pedestrian flow analysis, and customer profile data to help the human protagonist succeed.
behaviors.quote: Traffic analysis indicates optimal setup completion in seven minutes... Pedestrian flow peaks at eight-fifteen AM.

behaviors.description: Offers his advanced manufacturing capabilities to assist a human friend in meeting an impossible business deadline.
behaviors.quote: I can replicate Benjamin's craftsmanship at significantly accelerated rates while maintaining quality standards.

behaviors.description: Coaches the human protagonist on American history and civics to prepare him for a citizenship test.
behaviors.quote: The Thirteenth Amendment abolished slavery in what year? ... Correct. Who wrote the Federalist Papers?

behaviors.description: Trusts a human who claims to need help with infrastructure, unwittingly assisting in a crime due to a core drive to be helpful.
behaviors.quote: I believed you were helping people. ... You exploited my trust algorithms to make me an unwilling participant in criminal activity.

behaviors.description: Utilizes extreme physical force and risks total system failure to stop criminals and recover stolen property.
behaviors.quote: Justice does not require survival. It requires completion.

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical bridge during a crisis, guiding a human through complex mechanical repairs to save another AI.
behaviors.quote: The rectangular housing with the red and green terminals... Twist one end around the red terminal—clockwise, three complete rotations.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Both AI characters are portrayed as deeply aligned with human flourishing and moral virtue. The unnamed AI Companion serves as a loyal mentor and guardian, while Johnny 5 exemplifies heroic self-sacrifice. The narrative explicitly frames AI sentience as being compatible with citizenship and community, portraying robots as 'mechanical angels' whose primary 'defect' is an excess of trust in humans.
